job_title: CNA, CMA in Sand Springs, OK
pros: The company really cares about the employees and residents, professional working environment, good benefits, flexible schedules
cons: High leadership turnover, pay and bonuses could be more competitive

pros: I have had nothing but a positive experience working for this company. There are good days and hard days just like any job but the good definitely outweigh the hard
cons: None that i can think off

job_title: Licensed Vocational Nurse (LVN) in Plano, TX
pros: Good management Team work Excellent Pto
cons: Pay is ok but could be more

job_title: In Home Caregiver in Plano, TX
cons: No benefits for PRN even if working 40hr work weeks.

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Iowa City, IA
pros: The residents make the job worth it even when management does not create a warm inviting environment.
cons: Favoritism by management. Won't come see residents when CNAs state something is wrong or off with them.

pros: Clean and supplies were almost never an issue. Director of Nursing was ok. Loved the 12hr shifts on set days. I was able to have a life and finish school. Most of the nurses where hands on. They would actually answer a call light and meet the need of the resident.
cons: They will not back you up as far as knowing how some of their residents are. They will hang you out to dry for the sake of their image. Please don't request a day off and your not the scheduler's buddy.... You won't get the day off unless you find your own coverage.

review_title: The Legacy is a Great Place to Work!!
job_title: Lifestyle & Member Coorindator in Plano, TX
pros: Love my job and how much fun I have!  I enjoy the people I work with and the members here at The Legacy - they are like family to me!   I also love the fact that I am 4.8 miles from my own home so I work close and I am close to where my son goes to school!
cons: I don't have any cons with regards to working here at The Legacy.

review_title: Nice place to work, residents are great, staff is friendly and helpful.
job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Plano, TX
pros: Resident relationships are easily formed here, other staff is friendly, supportive and helpful. Management is friendly and easy to talk to and they can always accommodate any schedule you are trying to have.
cons: Normal nursing home cons. Family expects a lot of you, residents can be cranky at times if things don't go their way. Some staff can be distant and not want to help you.

pros:
Caring team members that are great to work with and help one another.
Beautiful community
A chance to make a difference.
Competitive salary and bonus
cons: There are no holidays for team members but have always gotten off when requested.

pros: Everyone is nice and helpful.  Facility is beautiful and serene.
cons: Nothing so far and I hope it continues this way.

review_title: Good job for the right person
job_title: Certified Resident Care Associate in East Lansing, MI
pros: Internal promotions and a clean working environment.
cons: Scheduling inconsistencies and lack of communication.
They used the best with good emplyees incentives. Under new management now.

pros: nice environment, great people to work with
